title: Legendary Whitetails Men's Buck Camp Flannel, Long Sleeve Plaid Button Down Casual Shirt, Corduroy Cuffs
descriptions:
Introducing the Legendary Whitetails Men's Buck Camp Flannel, a must-have addition to your wardrobe! This long sleeve plaid button-down casual shirt is designed for both style and comfort. Made from 100% cotton, this flannel is soft and comfortable against your skin. 

The shirt features a relaxed fit, allowing for ease of movement without any pulling or tugging. It is perfect for layering or can be worn as a standalone piece. The double-pleated back adds a touch of sophistication to the design, while the corduroy lined collar and cuffs provide extra warmth and style.

The 5.1-ounce fabric weight ensures durability and pill-resistance, keeping your shirt looking sharp for a long time. The fade-resistant material maintains its vibrant colors even after multiple washes. 

You'll appreciate the classic single pocket with a pencil slot, providing a convenient storage option. Additionally, the shirt is imported and comes with a size chart for your reference.

The Legendary Whitetails Men's Buck Camp Flannel is suitable for both indoor and outdoor settings. Whether you're relaxing at home or heading out for an adventure, this flannel is the perfect choice. It offers immediate out-of-the-box comfort, requires no break-in period, and is true to the images displayed.

For optimal shrinkage management, simply follow the care instructions provided. The flannel is designed to enhance durability with corduroy lining on the cuffs and collar. It also offers shape maintenance, ensuring a consistent and sharp look.

Upgrade your wardrobe with this authentic and high-quality flannel. Don't miss out on the opportunity to experience the comfort and style of the Legendary Whitetails Men's Buck Camp Flannel.
